high_impact_events.headline: 'Amazon's New World MMO is reportedly killing $1,500 Nvidia GPUs'
high_impact_events.summary: There are rumors that a new online game from Amazon will render high-end NVIDIA graphics cards obsolete and may lead to their price drops.
high_impact_events.rationale: This event has a high impact as it can significantly affect the demand for high-end GPUs. A major MMO using low-end or free-to-play technology could drastically reduce the market value of existing high-performance GPUs.

medium_impact_events.headline: 'NVIDIA's Lovelace-based cards could release next year'
medium_impact_events.summary: There is an expectation that NVIDIA will release new graphics card models based on the upcoming Lovelace architecture, which is expected to be released in the near future.
medium_impact_events.rationale: This event has a medium impact as it represents a potential release of high-performance GPUs. Such announcements can significantly affect consumer expectations and pricing strategies for the industry.

medium_impact_events.headline: 'NVIDIA's DLSS is now freely available to any developer who wants it'
medium_impact_events.summary: The NVIDIA Deep Learning Super Sampling (DLSS) feature has been made publicly accessible for developers, allowing them to implement the technology in their games.
medium_impact_events.rationale: This event represents a significant step forward for DLSS as it can potentially accelerate adoption by game developers. However, its impact is limited compared to product releases or market impacts.

low_impact_events.headline: 'Rumor: Nvidia to release its own version of Nintendo Switch with RTX Super Switch GPU'
low_impact_events.summary: There is a rumor that NVIDIA will release an exclusive version of the Nintendo Switch, dubbed RTX Super Switch, which will feature RTX GPUs.
low_impact_events.rationale: This event seems to be in the realm of speculation and rumor without any concrete information or official announcement. It does not have significant implications for existing GPU markets.

low_impact_events.headline: 'NVIDIA Ampere RTX Workstations Capable of Overclocking With Newest MSI Afterburner Beta'
low_impact_events.summary: An update to the NVIDIA driver allows for overclocking of NVIDIA GPUs in certain workstation models, potentially enhancing performance.
low_impact_events.rationale: This event represents a minor upgrade that may not significantly impact end-users or market dynamics. However, it is still noteworthy as it provides more control over GPU settings.

low_impact_events.summary: An update to the NVIDIA driver allows for overclocking of NVIDIA GPUs in certain workstation models, potentially enhancing performance.
